intro.title: About REE – GIC
intro.text: The Network of Engaged Entrepreneurs – Global Industry Center (REE–GIC) is a collective initiative bringing together entrepreneurs, investors, and economic actors around a shared vision: building a sustainable, inclusive, and resilient economy.

impact.title: REE – GIC Impact
impact.text: Through its initiatives, REE–GIC generates measurable social and economic impact. Our projects contribute to job creation, skills development, strengthening local value chains, and improving living conditions. Each action is designed to deliver long-term, environmentally responsible results that benefit future generations.

organisation.title: REE – GIC Organization
organisation.text: REE–GIC operates through a structured organization and transparent governance model. The network is based on collaboration, accountability, and active participation, ensuring effective project management and alignment between strategic vision and tangible results.

about.title: About REE – GIC
about.subtitle: A network of entrepreneurs committed to sustainable economic development

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: The mission of the Network of Engaged Entrepreneurs – Global Industry Center (REE–GIC) is to bring together visionary entrepreneurs around sustainable economic projects with strong social impact. The organization supports the creation and structuring of businesses in production, transformation, and services sectors.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: REE–GIC aims to become a key driver of economic development in Haiti and the Caribbean region by building an inclusive, structured, and resilient entrepreneurial ecosystem.

values.title: Values
values.text: The values of REE – GIC form the foundation of all our actions. We believe in responsible entrepreneurship built on integrity, collaboration, and sustainable impact. Our commitment is grounded in transparent governance, respect for local communities, and the development of human capital. We promote meaningful innovation focused on practical solutions that foster inclusive growth, create sustainable jobs, and strengthen economic resilience. Through these values, REE – GIC positions itself as a committed actor in long-term economic and social development.

areas.title: Strategic Areas
areas.production_desc: The Production pillar focuses on developing local production units capable of meeting national market needs while promoting responsible industrialization and sustainable job creation.
areas.transformation_desc: Transforming local raw materials increases added value, strengthens competitive value chains, and enhances technical skills within local communities.
areas.services_desc: The Services pillar provides advisory, training, project management, and digital solutions to support entrepreneurs and ensure the sustainability and performance of initiatives.
